amendment.description: Amendment struck section 102 which left the current set-asides for SBIR and STTR unchanged.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-603 to strike section 102--doing so leaves the current set-asides for SBIR and STTR unchanged.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ehlers amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Ehlers.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ehlers amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
